/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a palette of red, white, and gray. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds. In the distance, a tall skyscraper pierces the skyline, standing as a testament to the city's modern architecture. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the urban landscape.
